purpleculture_pinyin:
ráo
surname Rao; rich; abundant; exuberant; to add for free; to throw in as bonus; to spare; to forgive; despite; although
фамилия Рао; богатые; обильный; обильный; добавить бесплатно; добавить в качестве бонуса; жалеть; простить; несмотря на; несмотря на то что
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 饶)
Pictophonetic: 堯 indicates the sound; 飠 (food) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
饒恕 [ ráo shù ]: to forgive; to pardon; to spare
饒有 [ ráo yǒu ]: full of (interest, humor, sentiment etc)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 飠 [ shí ] food; to eat
    • 堯 [ yáo ] a legendary ancient emperor-sage
heisig_chinese_memo: There's never spare food in the pigpen cuz everything gets eaten everytime.
Ru_trainchinese: ráo: (глаг) щадить, прощать, миловать; давать вдобавок (при этом не получая ничего в ответ)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: go high (堯) to eat (𩙿) because it's abundant
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The javelin thrower likes to eat a banana for food before practice but also spare one for in the middle of practice as well.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " food " to " Yao " sound. The original meaning is full. "Said Wen": "Spare, full. From food, Yaosheng." Duan Yucai's note: "For those who spare, you are full." The extension means abundance and abundance. "Jade articles. Food Department: "Rao, Feng Ye." Such as "Mo Zi. "Beicheng Gate": "Otherwise, the mountains, forests, grasses and grasses will be rich in Ashikaga." Biographies of Southwestern Yi: "Since the Han is the strong, the Bashu is the forgiveness, and the Yelangdao is the home of officials, it is easy to be very easy." Wang Zhongxuan's "Poems from the Army": "Soldiers are full of mercy, and both men and horses are overflowing with fat. Traveling and riding on both sides of the road, there is more money left.

" Rao " also means that the land is fertile. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Sixth Year of Chenggong": "You must live in the land of Xun and Xia, fertile and near to the corner, and you can't lose it." "Guan Zi. "Eight Views": "Fushan has a lot of land, so there are more vegetation; if the soil is fertile, mulberry and hemp are easy to reproduce; if grass is more fertile, six animals are easy to multiply."

" Spare " can also mean a generous gift or gain. "Guang Ya. Shi Xu Yi: "Rao, Yi Ye." Such as "Warring States Policy. "Zhao Cesan": "When Zhongshan heard it, I thought the king took the land because of Rao Zhongshan." "Historical Records. "The Family of Prime Minister Chen": "Today the king is slow and less courteous, and the scholars will not come. However, the king can forgive others as nobles, and most of the stubborn and shameless scholars will return to the Han."

" Forgive " means to forgive, forgive. "Zhengzitong. Shibu": "Forgiveness, commonly known as forgiveness is forgiveness." For example, Du Mu in the Tang Dynasty "Send the Hermit": "Justice is only white in the world, and nobles never forgive." Chapter 19 of "Journey to the West": "What are your skills? , Give it the truth, and spare your life." "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 44: "The little girl was so scared, she was crying, just meet her for mercy."

" Rao " means concession and humility. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Li Bai's "Song of the Emperor on the West Tour of Nanjing": "The color of the willows is not green in the Qin land, and the flowers are not diminished by the red sun." Lu You in the Northern Song Dynasty "Autumn Sounds": "The poems of the geese and the falling of the string are also successful, and the pen is not the strength of the bow. "Wang Shifu in Yuan Dynasty"Jixianbin. Retire>: "Take a step back and take care of everything."

" Rao " can also be used as a conjunction, which is equivalent to "despite" and "anything". Zhu Junsheng "Shuowen Tong Xun Ding Sheng": "Rao, also borrowed for the responsibility, reason, as such, the Tang people used to spare him, the false word for sparing, all turn with one sound." For example, Du Mu in the Tang Dynasty "Ape": "Three He is desperate and suspicious. Rao is a boy with a white head today." Zhang Xian in the Northern Song Dynasty "Shanting Feast": "Rao him more thoughtful afterwards, it is always like a feast." Li Yu of the Qing Dynasty "Naihetian. Yalue>: "A confidant has a rule of fate, and I am not afraid of the four wings of a boudoir. Rao Yi has a lot of plans, but the meaning is beyond the sky."

" Rao " is the last name. "Fun Tongyi. "Last Name": "Rao, the Han Dynasty had Rao Bin, and he was the prefect of Yuyang." The celebrities of the past include the Southern Song scholar Rao Yannian, the Yuan Dynasty calligrapher Rao Jie, and the contemporary Chinese master Rao Zongyi.
humanum_short_description_en: From " food " to " Yao " sound. The original meaning is fullness, and the extension is abundance and abundance.
humanum_full_description:
從「食」，「堯」聲。本義是飽足。《說文》：「饒，飽也。从食，堯聲。」段玉裁注：「饒者，甚飽之䛐也。」引申表示豐足、充裕。《玉篇．食部》：「饒，豐也。」如《墨子．備城門》：「不然，山林草澤之饒足利。」《史記．西南夷列傳》：「誠以漢之彊，巴蜀之饒，通夜郎道，為置吏，易甚。」《文選．王仲宣〈從軍詩〉》：「軍人多飫饒，人馬皆溢肥。徒行兼乘還，空出有餘資。」

　　「饒」又表示土地肥沃。如《左傳．成公六年》：「必居郇、瑕氏之地，沃饒而近盬，國利君樂，不可失也。」《管子．八觀》：「夫山澤廣大，則草木易多也；壤地肥饒，則桑麻易殖也；薦草多衍，則六畜易繁也。」

　　「饒」也可以表示厚贈、使增益。《廣雅．釋詁一》：「饒，益也。」如《戰國策．趙策三》：「中山聽之，是我以王因饒中山而取地也。」《史記．陳丞相世家》：「今大王慢而少禮，士廉節者不來；然大王能饒人以爵邑，士之頑鈍嗜利無恥者亦多歸漢。」

　　「饒」表示寬恕、饒恕。《正字通．食部》：「饒，俗謂寬恕曰饒。」如唐代杜牧〈送隱者〉：「公道世間唯白髮，貴人頭上不曾饒。」《西遊記》第19回：「你有甚麼本事，實實供來，饒你性命。」《紅樓夢》第44回：「那小丫頭子已經嚇的魂飛魄散，哭著，只管碰頭求饒。」

　　「饒」表示退讓、謙遜。如唐代李白〈上皇西巡南京歌〉：「柳色未饒秦地綠，花光不減上陽紅。」北宋陸游〈秋聲〉：「弦開雁落詩亦成，筆力未饒弓力勁。」元代王實甫〈集賢賓．退隱〉：「退一步乾坤大，饒一著萬慮休。」

　　「饒」亦可作連詞，相當於「儘管」、「任憑」。朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「饒，又借為任、為由、為如，唐人所用饒他，假饒字，皆一聲之轉。」如唐代杜牧〈猿〉：「三聲欲斷疑腸斷，饒是少年今白頭。」北宋張先〈山亭宴〉：「饒他此後更思量，總莫似，當筵情緒。」清代李漁〈奈何天．崖略〉：「紅顏薄命有成律，不怕閨人生四翼。饒伊百計奈何天，究意奈何天不得。」

　　「饒」是姓氏。《風俗通義．姓氏》：「饒氏，漢有饒斌，為漁陽太守。」歷代名人還有南宋學者饒延年、元代書法家饒介和當代國學大師饒宗頤等。
humanum_short_description: 從「食」，「堯」聲。本義是飽足，引申為豐足、充裕。

HSK 6: 饶,饒
(Simplified: 饶)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 堯 indicates the sound; 飠 (food) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 飠 [ shí ] food; to eat
    • 堯 [ yáo ] a legendary ancient emperor-sage
①富足，多：富饒。饒裕。饒舌(多話)。
②寬恕，免除處罰：饒恕。饒命。
③儘管：饒這樣，他還不同意。
④另外增添：饒頭。買十饒一。
⑤姓氏。
饒恕 [ ráo shù ]: to forgive; to pardon; to spare
饒有 [ ráo yǒu ]: full of (interest, humor, sentiment etc)

饒字的基本解释

饒
ráo
见“饶”。

饒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ráo］
［《廣韻》如招切，平宵，日。］
［《廣韻》人要切，去笑，日。］
“饶1”的繁体字。
(1)富裕；丰足。
(2)指丰富的物产。
(3)饱满。
(4)众多，多。
(5)（土地）肥沃。
(6)馀；剩。
(7)厚赐；多给。
(8)厚惠。
(9)增加；另外增添。
(10)逸；安乐。
(11)宽容；饶恕。
(12)引申为怜。
(13)厚；重；浓。
(14)让。
(15)娇艳；美好。
(16)连词。相当于“任憑”、“儘管”。
(17)不但。
(18)古地名。在今河北省饶阳县东北。
(19)用同“驍”。参见“饒勇”、“饒果”。
(20)通“譊”。争讼。参见“饒辯”。
(21)姓。

饒字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　饒； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1425第40
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?如招切，音蕘。【玉篇】多也，飽也，豐也，厚也，餘也。又益也，賸也。【禮·曲禮】大饗不問卜，不饒富。【註】富之言備也。備而已，勿多於禮也。【前漢·?平傳】平娶張氏，資用益饒。又對漢王曰：大王能饒人以爵邑。　又俗謂寬恕曰饒。【杜甫·立秋後詩】日月不相饒，節序昨夜隔。　又國名。【前漢·地理志】北海郡縣饒侯國。　又縣名。【前漢·地理志】屬西河郡。莽曰饒衍。【後漢·郡國志】安平國饒陽，故名饒。　又州名。本楚番邑，吳置鄱陽郡，隋攺饒州，以物產富饒也。　又姓。【風俗通】漢有饒武，爲漁陽太守。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】人要切【正韻】實照切，?音邵。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ráo]
["Guangyun" such as cutting, night, day. ]
["Guangyun" people want to cut, laugh, day. ]
Traditional characters for "饶1".
(1) Wealth; abundance.
(2) Refers to abundant properties.
(3) Fullness.
(4) Many, many.
(5) (The land) is fertile.
(6) Remaining; remaining.
(7) Give generously; give more.
(8) Houhui.
(9) Increase; add additionally.
(10) Yi; Ease.
(11) Tolerance; forgiveness.
(12) The extension is pity.
(13) Thick; heavy; thick.
(14) Let.
(15) Charming; beautiful.
(16) Conjunctions. It is equivalent to "let alone" and "despite".
(17) Not only.
(18) Ancient place names. In today's northeast of Raoyang County, Hebei Province.
(19) Use the same as "Xiao". See "Rao Yong", "Rao Guo".
(20) Through "譊". Dispute. See "arguing".
(21) Last name.
Rao

Ping Chuan] Marrying Zhang's Ping Ping, the capital is beneficial. He also said to the Han king: The king can forgive others as Jueyi.　It is also commonly called forgiveness and forgiveness. [Poems after the beginning of autumn by Du Fu] The sun and the moon are not forgiving, and the festival sequence is separated last night.　 Also the name of the country. [Pre-Han·Geography] Raohouguo, Beihai County.　Also the county name. [Former Han Geography] belongs to Xihe County. Mang said Rao Yan. [Later Han·Jun Guo Zhi] Rao Yang in Anping State, hence the name Rao.　Also the name of the state. Ben Chu Fanyi, Wu set Poyang County, Sui Dynasty Raozhou, it is also rich in products.　Another last name. [Customs and Customs] Han had Rao Wu, and was the prefect of Yuyang.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] People want to cut [Zheng Yun] Really cut,? Yin Shao. The same meaning.
